findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketingDivisor, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable and disable buyBack.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has the capability to enable or disable presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock, potentially retaking privileges even after ownership renouncement
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to regain control of the contract even after relinquishing ownership.
